speakers.quote: I founded and created Laravel for the happiness of all sentient beings, especially developers.
Hello! My name is Jonathan Reinink. I work at Tailwind Labs where we build Tailwind CSS and Tailwind UI, among other things. I am also active in the open source community.
Greetings! I'm Andre, a full-stack web developer and Laracasts instructor. My other hobbies include playing guitar, video graphs and gaming.
I help build Laravel with Taylor Otwell, and am currently working on Forge, Envoyer, Spark, Vapor, Telescope, and Horizon.
Proud Dad, Software Developer, Hobby Data Scientist, Degenerate Gambler. Follow me on Medium or connect on LinkedIn.
I'm a developer and managing partner at my company Beyond Code, living near MÃ¶nchengladbach in Germany. You can follow me on Twitter to stay connected.
